Sentencas: Ceria based zirconia solid electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells were synthesized using a simple and environment-friendly sol-gel route via hydrolysis process.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Influence of Zr4+ ions on three different compositions Ce0.8Zr0.2O1.9, Ce0.7Zr0.3O1.85 and Ce0.6Zr0.4O1.8 were investigated.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Phase identification and cell parameters were determined by powder X-ray diffraction studies.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Rietveld refinement was confirmed the synthesized cerium zirconium oxide possess a cubic fluorite type structure.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: BET surface analysis exhibited that the materials which possessed high surface area may increase the probability of effective electron transport at the electrode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Charge-transfer transition from O2- (2p) to Ce4+ (4f) orbitals in cerium oxide were examined by UV-vis and photoluminescence studies.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The Zr4+ ions on cerium lattice create the oxygen vacancy and lead to the formation of Ce3+ from Ce4+.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity was analyzed using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: CZ0.4 showed a higher electrical conductivity of 0.745 x 10(-3) Scm(-1) and lower activation energy of 0.97 eV at 600 A degrees C than the other compositions.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The incorporation of Zr4+ ions influence to reduce the ionic band between Ce and O, which makes the motion of oxygen as flexible and it was confirmed with cyclic voltammetry analysis.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The stability of electrolyte was examined by chronoamperometry studies.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: A very quick current drop (t = 0.17 s) was revealed the stability of electrolyte.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Hence, these results suggest that the modified ceria based zirconia solid electrolytes can be a suitable material for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical behavior of ceria based zirconia electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications
